ISSUE.TITLE: Docker-compose. Version top-level element is obsolete
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In the new version of Compose Specification, the top-level Version parameter [has been made optional](https://github.com/compose-spec/compose-spec/blob/main/spec.md#version-and-name-top-level-elements) and deprecated, which is also indicated by a warning when creating a container. We need to remove these parameters from our configuration files

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7270 Removed Version top-level element us it is obsolete
